title: League Disconnected me from game and won't let me rejoin. It will only let me create new game
body:
As title says, I was playing ranked on my account when I lost connection. I closed out of the client and relogged in, which usually lets me rejoin the game. However, the client goes to the main landing page as usual (as if I weren't in a game currently) and will let me requeue for a new game.

After checking op.gg, the game is still currently ongoing. Presumably I'm the only one from my game to have been kicked off. help please.

replies.body: If you weren't ever given the option to reconnect, you most likely encountered a game that crashed server side. It's rather rare, but when this happens everyone else is booted from the match as well and it seems like it just never existed. You won't get any penalties for that match, and can requeue as normal afterward.
